content.prompt: Greencom is currently producing 20 units of output. At this level of output, Greencomâ€™s marginal revenue is $6, marginal cost is $6, and average total cost is $9. If Greencom operates in a monopolistically competitive market and sells all 20 units of output for $10 per unit, it can be concluded that

choices.label: Greencom would earn more profit by decreasing output
Greencom would earn more profit by increasing output
Greencom is earning zero economic profit
Greencom is earning negative economic profit
Greencom is earning positive economic profit

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
